website_summaries.verdict: This razor stands out for the maneuverability of the flexible head and the long-lasting battery life which can hold a charge for several days.
pros: The flexible head works great, allowing users to get at tough-to-reach spots some other razors cannot, utilizing Philips signature three head blade system for good comfort
The razor outlasts most models with a full charge
Can be used dry or wet
cons: The trimmer attachment requires removing the razor head to be used, and is easier to misplace than the pop-up attachments on other models

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 30 year old son for Christmas. He HATES it! He says it’s the worst shaver he’s ever owned. He requested this model thinking it would be an upgrade from his old shaver. WRONG! He says it doesn’t shave closely at all and he doesn’t have a particularly tough hair type. And guess what??? AMAZON DOES NOT ALLOW RETURNS of “personal” items...even defective ones! BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: oubandmom

customer_reviews.title: Weak Weak and Weak
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace my old 3100 model that was on it's third set of blades. I thought this one would be better stronger and give a closer shave as the design is fairly impressive. Nope. To add insult to injury, it is not returnable. Take my advice, buy the cheap 3 series.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Katy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: The razor is not up to the claims made by Philips or even close. The instructions are merely attempt's to cover up the razors drawbacks. It takes forever achieve an acceptable shave and then it's not a smooth one. Not worth the cast!
customer_reviews.author: rffw30a

customer_reviews.title: Husband's Favorite Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this shaver now for the 2nd time - I'm sure it's a newer version, but basically the same shaver. After buying replacement heads a few times, hubby decided the shaver had seen better days and asked me to order another one. He will consider no other than a Norelco for close shave and long lasting performance.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: ... lot of electric razors but this one if the best I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of electric razors but this one if the best I ever had !! The power is awesome so NEVER any hair pulling or scrapes or anything but a superior close shave !! Comfort level is off the charts !! Worth every penny !! Would highly recommend this product to anyone. No more trying anymore razors. This is the one !!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cavallaro

customer_reviews.title: Spend extra to get the turbo feature
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very good product- easy and light to hold, shaves well, Charges easily. Downside: 1. Must disconnect to use trimmer 2. Would be better with Turbo. Suggest pay the difference to get this feature.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: please dont waste your money, this is my second norelco, because I want to try another model...took me many passes and took an extraordinary long time to get down to a close shave. It felt like I was mowing my lawn with a blender motor attached to my lawn mower...my face is on fire. don't use it
customer_reviews.author: niyasdeen

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade was worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've used the smaller, cheaper shavers with the HQ-8 blades for many, many years; keeping from upgrading because of comments that the more expensive models don't shave any closer. Well...they were wrong! The shaving heads are bigger and clog less, cut closer and are smoother than any of the HQ-8 models I've used. Worth the $60 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandfather as a gift. He said he likes the way it shaves. He’s pretty hard to please, so it must be good. Seemed to be light weight to me, but I’m not the one using it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: After <3 months it no longer works when plugged in
customer_reviews.text: Shaver worked great at first. However, less than 3 months after buying it, it will no longer work when plugged in. I can charge it, and then it works on battery, but won't work plugged in. Super frustrating. Yesterday, battery died half way through shaving, and the shaver wouldn't start up again until the battery was charged, so went through an entire work day with 1/2 shaved beard.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst electric razor I have ever used. My $17 Remington that I bought 7 years ago picks up more hair in less passes. I bought this because the cutting heads looked like they had R&D justifying the design. Absolutely wrong. This razor takes an unreasonable amount of time to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Richardson

customer_reviews.title: good build but takes FOREVER to shave with
customer_reviews.text: good build but takes FOREVER to shave with. doesnt seem like its do anything some times, and i eventually finish shaving with my old straight edge, which was not the point of buying this shaver. been using it for 6months now.
customer_reviews.author: tphilp

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver, it’s been a long time since my last new shaver. If I knew how nice this shaver would be I would have purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Standing

customer_reviews.title: May not be a good choice
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn’t feel that robust in terms of the materials compare to my older Philips shaver, and the motor doesn’t “sound” powerful either. Compare to older model with 2 knives this one doesn’t shave better but more clumsy because of the size of the 3 knives shaver head...,,
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good shave, although it takes more time and sometimes can knick myself if I’m not careful.. but can use this thing just about anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Jswia

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Make sure you pull the heads for cleaning occasionally. Hair clogs the blades pretty quickly, especially if you use wet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S Anderson

customer_reviews.title: VERY EFFICIENT
customer_reviews.text: Love Norelco, was replacing my old one!! GREAT product, would DEFINITELY recommend to others!!
customer_reviews.author: HIGHLANDER

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing keeps me fresh daily quick and easy no more bumps from razor, Saw it on Youtuber Nick Metos channel and he is Greek so lots of hair
customer_reviews.author: King Keavin

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's really light weight and plastic. It's not very loud/powerful and takes quite a few passes. Does not shave as close as a razor, but it also does not cut as easily as one. Overall it's just okay nothing impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and fast razor
customer_reviews.text: Nice razor. Lighter than my prior 15 year old Norelco. Bigger head, smoother action. Not crazy about removing the head to install the clipper, as this connection may wear out. Still I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Bad job, Norelco.
customer_reviews.text: Takes twice as long to shave as my previous norelco. Higher priced models are a whopping 10% faster. Whoopee .. big deal. Also much bulkier and as others have said, the on-off switch is in a bad position; right where you want to place your thumb.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't repurchase this shaver.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, the detachable device is more complicated. It shaves as good as the other models. I'm going to toss this thing in the trash and purchase the combination shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cut
customer_reviews.text: This razor does not cut. I have to go over my face 3-4 times.
customer_reviews.author: April T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality cheap shaver
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent for the price. Need to replace the head yearly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bangerter

customer_reviews.title: I always wanted to get one.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, and I still need to use a razor for an even closer shave.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got them for a steal on black friday. These work great, and are totally worth the $36 I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Abir Chaudhuri

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and the person I bought it for has been very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Robyn K

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Wish it could work while plugged in, however I don’t need that function
customer_reviews.author: Cdk

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shaver. He loves that it’s easy to clean and that it can be taken with him.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Great results !
customer_reviews.text: My husband has,a tough beard he hates to shave. He loves this new shaver, is easy to use , great results and his face is so soft now!, This shaver is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for hubby travels with it all time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for hubby travels with it all time and uses when home as wlell. No more irritation on his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shaver stopped working..
customer_reviews.text: This shaver worked well for a while but after about 8 months it has stopped working. Can this be returned and exchanged for a new one ?
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Best electric razor I have found! Shaves FAST! Easy and almost fun to use. Have tried much more expensive models and the 5100 is beating all. Very glad I found it and bought it. - Gary T
customer_reviews.author: Aeterna Veritas

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Rinsing with water is an easy cleanup. Shaves closely, but it's still new.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this razor
customer_reviews.text: Battery is weak and will not hold charge. Shaver does not Shave completely. Phillips razor have worked well in the past so that is why this one was purchased. Very disappointed in this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replacing one that finally gave up the ghost...my husband's favorite
customer_reviews.author: TrishS

customer_reviews.title: Poor design compared to simpler model
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good a shave as my old model. Don’t like the separate trimmer attachment.
customer_reviews.author: webssenior

customer_reviews.title: it's great as a trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time; it's great as a trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Onur Ayaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than previous Norelco, easier to clean and holds more whiskers.
customer_reviews.author: John Dappert

customer_reviews.title: close shave
customer_reviews.text: takes a few days for your face to adjust to it
customer_reviews.author: B Y

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Very Bad.... It doesn't clearly shave... One of the worst Philips Shaver..
customer_reviews.author: DR.JEE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, bought it many time because I keep losing it or forgotten it at hotels.
customer_reviews.author: ly

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The machine look very good and fancy but in daily use she didn't to what she need to.
customer_reviews.author: liav Menachem

customer_reviews.title: Very happy to buy it
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Yulong Chen

customer_reviews.title: here is the best price. And I bought it for my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: I compared price with target and walmar,here is the best price.And I bought it for my boyfriend, he liked it and we bought some gifted to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jiayun Liu

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Simply doses not work. Rotors are slow and nip at your skin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mark K

customer_reviews.title: Need several time to clean my beard
customer_reviews.text: Easy-to-use product. But I usually spend several time to clean my beard.
customer_reviews.author: Zeyu Dai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phillips razor is nice and feels good while shaving. No more razor bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Roxas

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value!
customer_reviews.text: There were two of these shavers that seemed identical except one was 68 dollars and one was 99? Of course I bought the one for 68! My husband loves it. The trimmer works great, he likes to use it on the back of his neck hairs between haircuts.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cole

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My husband did not like it. He said it does not give a clean shave.
customer_reviews.author: Shweta Tiwari Pandey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great and second time to buy! I love Philips product very much!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my teenager. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: R.R

customer_reviews.title: Previously used the Norelco 7345XL. The 5100 does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Previously used the Norelco 7345XL. The 5100 does not shave nearly as close, especially along the neckline. I had to start using a straight razor in addition to this razor. I have since reverted to the old razor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: For sensitive skin or a quick shave
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin, or like a quick clean shave, an electric shaver is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: A total disappointment, it did not give me anything other than ...
customer_reviews.text: 75 Yrs old, have had numerous electric shavers... But, had been using a standard razors to shave with. But having 43 heart stints and taking blood thinners, having a blood flowing every morning I deceided to purchase this highly rated Norelco shaver. A total disappointment, it did not give me anything other than a bloodless result with most all facial hair still in tact... I wanted it to work but it did not!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin J. Hirtzel

customer_reviews.title: 5 star shaver for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this without seeing it in the store to get a better feel. So glad I bought this shaver!! Puts my old Phillips Norelco to shame! Charge holds well, blades are smooth on my face, and the head moves very easy. The only negative, if there is one, is the shaver attachment to do your side burns. You have to pop off the entire head of the razor. Would have been nice if you didn’t have to do that, but don’t let that deter you from buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely hate this shaver
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this shaver. I have had it for almost two months and have not ever gotten a good shave from it. I have tried everything. The electic save cream. holding my skin tight. I can shave with this thing for 20min, non stop, and have the worst shave ever. Then I have to pull out my manual razor to clean up what this hunk of garbage leaves. Now I need to buy a different shaver after having spent good money on this thing. Do yourself a favor, buy a Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I believe there is a good improvement over the cheaper $40 ones. Gets the jaws and neck real nicely. I've always had trouble with right under the nose and it just gets it all. The cheaper ones never would. It was a little tough on the skin the first couple days and it's more of a triangle shape instead of a circle but now it's real smooth. I would buy it again or I would almost pay more for a even better one but there is no returns so I feel safe with this one. I would give it five stars if it got under the nose just a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shave Ever
customer_reviews.text: Without exaggeration, this shaver provides the worst shave I've ever had. Even without having a thick or dense beard, this consistently misses dozens of whiskers all over my face and neck. It is much worse if I skip a day on the weekend. Slowing down and making multiple passes does not seem to help, but does leave my neck looking like I've been garroted. I think the issue is that there is only a single ring of blades in each head, rather than two like the prior model.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit disappointed in this shaver. It has a nice feel too it but just did not give me the close shave that my other Norelco did that finally stopped working. The packaging that arrived really was frustration free and that I did like. If you are looking for a closer shave you might want to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good razor
customer_reviews.text: Works well with little maintenance required. Running water and an occasional charge is all you need. Have used 3 different Norelco shavers over the last 30 years. The trimmer is not as convenient as the pop up kind on my last shaver but still works well. Keep my old shaver charged for trimmer use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Works with 240V and gives good shave with flexible head
customer_reviews.text: Flexible head is better than older Philips shaver that I had - gives a close and smooth shave. I have little facial hair so don't know about folks with a lot more - may not work as well for them. Has been a user of Philips savers for many years after I met the guys in Holland who created the 3-head rotating blade design.
customer_reviews.author: W L.

customer_reviews.title: 6th electric razor I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th electric razor I have owned and by far the easiest to clean. just snap the head from the power unit and open and run under water, place on a washclother or something to dry and snap back on when dry. Done
customer_reviews.author: Bob Pittillo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and close shave!
customer_reviews.text: I was sad to replace my 6 year old Phillips Norelco but this shaver has been amazing. Great battery life, close and comfortable shave, and the travel feature that locks out the touch controls is a helpful feature. I hope this one lasts at least as long as my other Phillips Norelco!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Not near as good as previous Norelcos
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake and went for the cheaper unit, thinking it probably had the same technology as my previous shavers. It Does not work nearly as well as the older unit I had for 10 + years. Should have went with the more expensive unit. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Misleading claims of close shaving
customer_reviews.text: This product was pretty disappointing. It claims that it is a close shave but it took me longer than usual to shave and it still left a 5 o clock shadow. I had to shave with another razor after this. You are also unable to return this item. How is that even possible? Do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: Tina E

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Week battery. The blade don’t go to the edge of the face plate making it impossible to judge straight cuts off sideburns or under the nose. You HAVE to use the attached for that. Sucks
customer_reviews.author: Funky Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Best shavers on the market, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shaver I have owned since using Norelco Shavers over 20 years. Very easy to clean and does great around curves like the chin and is very quiet. I always use the dry method and it never disappoints me. Good job Phillips Norelco.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: spend your money on something else
customer_reviews.text: Problems: Louder than my other shaver. Shave is not smooth. Takes multiple passes over the same area to even trim 1 day growth. Head design is bad for upper lip.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works wells.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works very well. Bought it for a family member with Parkinson’s that can’t use a razor but likes a shaved face.
customer_reviews.author: heather d

customer_reviews.title: Needs a Stand but...
customer_reviews.text: Good shave, I just don't like that there isn't some sort of stand for it to sit on while charging. Also, trimmer is a pain and will probably be lost in a drawer soon. Overall, comfortable ,close shave wet or dry. Quality constuction.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Shave in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the extra few minutes in the shower. Shaving in the shower is the way to go. So much better than creams and gels. No after shave needed. Come out smooth skinned with no irritation.
customer_reviews.author: OpenSprit

customer_reviews.title: It works fine.
customer_reviews.text: It works - and works faster than my previous Shaver. A bit too big, and doesn't have a bag or case - that makes it less convenient for travel.
customer_reviews.author: yurakm

customer_reviews.title: good oproduct
customer_reviews.text: good product good price well known company better than others
customer_reviews.author: john m perry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a charge for days and is easy to clean. I just regret waiting so long to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Perez

customer_reviews.title: It's a norelco what more can I say
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband uses it all the time he loved his other one
customer_reviews.author: Proud Momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: The best part it can be used wet as well
customer_reviews.text: it seems fancy product but It does not cover the edges on the face. The best part it can be used wet as well. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Dinc.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this item!!! U can’t return if u want
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product. If u want to return, u can’t. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Oppenheim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worse shaves I have ever experienced! Will never buy their product again, or recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow is this thing quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Great shave and amazingly quiet operation. I am enjoying this new shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the wet shaving
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace my previous wet dry shaver. Not happy with the wet shaving, so I went back to dry shaving where it does an adequate job.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Vedova

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Wylie

customer_reviews.title: That it sucks....
customer_reviews.text: I've used norelco All of my life this is the worst shaver I've ever had...
customer_reviews.author: Dan Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt't save time compared to my previous Mach 3. ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt't save time compared to my previous Mach 3. But closer shaves with less irritation when using for wet shaves.
customer_reviews.author: SriRuleZ

customer_reviews.title: he is Bad and poor quality I've used it four times And ...
customer_reviews.text: he is Bad and poor quality I've used it four times And he was spoiled I recommend you Do not buy Not to deceived In this case like me
customer_reviews.author: Zaza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was missing a part when it arrived and they sent a replacement ASAP. No Complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Hate it! I bought for my husband and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Hate it! I bought for my husband and he said that it broke on him a week after using it. Not a great product, I hate how much I spent on it all for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: DTSCOTTFAMILY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found the 5100 wet dry Norelco, give a very close, smooth, non irritating shave
customer_reviews.author: countrygramps

customer_reviews.title: What Have You Done to Your Razors?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened to Norelco, but I switched to the Panasonic after I bought replacement blades that were terrible and then this razor that was just as bad. 35 yr proponent gone.
customer_reviews.author: Fred N

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco Electric Shaver 5100 Wet & Dry, S5210/86, Frustration Free Packaging
product_meta.description: The Shaver 5100 adds speed and comfort to your morning routine. Its Multi Precision blades raise and cut long and short hairs while shaving heads independently move in 5 directions to ensure close skin contact for a faster and closer shave, even on neck and jaw line.
feature_bullets: A close, fast shave. 75% of men beat their shaving time S5000 (no turbo) compared to Philips Click and Style
Blade System - Blades raise then cut long and short hairs for a fast shave
Five direction Flex Heads flex in 5 directions for a fast close shave
Aquatec Wet & Dry- Get a comfortable dry or refreshing wet shave. Anti-slip materials make it easy to shave with precision and comfort
Smart Click precision trimmer for perfect mustache and sideburn trimming

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
